name: RansomwareAttack
description: Case template for handling ransomware incidents.
author: Jes√∫s Angosto
summary: Investigation, containment, and eradication workflow for ransomware malware attacks.

tasks.title: Identify infected systems
tasks.description: Determine the extent of the infection by listing affected systems and users.

tasks.title: Contain the infection
tasks.description: Isolate infected systems and disable inter-network communications to prevent further spread.

tasks.title: Analyze the ransomware
tasks.description: Perform malware analysis to understand the ransomware behavior, extract IoCs, and hunt for additional propagation.

tasks.title: Restore from backups
tasks.description: Restore systems and data after validating backup integrity and ensuring clean recovery points.

tasks.title: Improve security controls
tasks.description: Implement new security measures and review existing ones for effectiveness.

tasks.title: Report to authorities
tasks.description: Report the incident to the relevant authorities (e.g., CERT, data protection agency) when required.

tasks.title: Document lessons learned
tasks.description: Capture lessons learned and update the incident response plan.

notes.title: Ransomware variant
notes.content: Details about the ransomware family or variant.

notes.title: Threat actor communication
notes.content: Summary of any communication with the threat actors.
